00049 #ifndef _BOARD_H_
00050 #define _BOARD_H_

00062 #define EVK1100           1   //!< AT32UC3A EVK1100 board.
00063 #define EVK1101           2   //!< AT32UC3B EVK1101 board.
00064 #define UC3C_EK           3   //!< AT32UC3C UC3C_EK board.
00065 #define EVK1104           4   //!< AT32UC3A3 EVK1104 board.
00066 #define EVK1105           5   //!< AT32UC3A EVK1105 board.
00067 #define STK600_RCUC3L0    6   //!< STK600 RCUC3L0 board.
00068 #define UC3L_EK           7   //!< AT32UC3L-EK board.
00069 #define XPLAIN            8   //!< ATxmega128A1 Xplain board
00070 #define XPLAIN_A1         9   //!< ATxmega128A1U Xplain-A1 board
00071 #define STK600_RC064X     10  //!< ATxmega256A3 STK600 board
00072 #define STK600_RC100X     11  //!< ATxmega128A1 STK600 board
00073 #define AVR_CONCERT_1     12  //!< AT32UC3A AVR Concert 1 board
00074 #define UC3_A3_XPLAINED   13  //!< ATUC3A3 UC3-A3-Xplained board
00075 #define UC3_C2_XPLAINED   14  //!< ATUC3C2 UC3-C2-Xplained board
00076 #define UC3_L0_XPLAINED   15  //!< ATUC3L0 UC3-L0-Xplained board
00077 #define STK600_RCUC3D     16  //!< STK600 RCUC3D board.
00078 #define STK600_RCUC3C0    17  //!< STK600 RCUC3C board.
00079 #define USER_BOARD        99  //!< User-reserved board (if any).
00080 #define DUMMY_BOARD      100  //!< Dummy board to support board-independant applications (e.g. bootloader)
00081 
00083 
00086 
00087 #define EXT1102                      1  //!< AT32UC3B EXT1102 board
00088 #define MC300                        2  //!< AT32UC3 MC300 board
00089 #define SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_1  3  //!< Xplained inertial sensor board 1
00090 #define SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_2  4  //!< Xplained inertial sensor board 2
00091 #define SENSORS_XPLAINED_PRESSURE_1  5  //!< Xplained pressure sensor board
00092 #define SENSORS_XPLAINED_LIGHT_1     6  //!< Xplained light & proximity sensor board
00093 #define SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_A1 7  //!< Xplained inertial sensor board "A"
00094 
00095 #define USER_EXT_BOARD              99  //!< User-reserved extension board (if any).

00098 #if BOARD == EVK1100
00099   #include "evk1100/evk1100.h"
00100 #elif BOARD == EVK1101
00101   #include "evk1101/evk1101.h"
00102 #elif BOARD == UC3C_EK
00103   #include "uc3c_ek/uc3c_ek.h"
00104 #elif BOARD == EVK1104
00105   #include "evk1104/evk1104.h"
00106 #elif BOARD == EVK1105
00107   #include "evk1105/evk1105.h"
00108 #elif BOARD == STK600_RCUC3L0
00109   #include "stk600/rcuc3l0/stk600_rcuc3l0.h"
00110 #elif BOARD == UC3L_EK
00111   #include "uc3l_ek/uc3l_ek.h"
00112 #elif BOARD == XPLAIN
00113   #include "xplain/xplain.h"
00114 #elif BOARD == XPLAIN_A1
00115   #include "xplain_a1/xplain_a1.h"
00116 #elif BOARD == STK600_RC064X
00117   #include "stk600/rc064x/stk600_rc064x.h"
00118 #elif BOARD == STK600_RC100X
00119   #include "stk600/rc100x/stk600_rc100x.h"
00120 #elif BOARD == AVR_CONCERT_1
00121   #include "avr_concert_1/avr_concert_1.h"
00122 #elif BOARD == UC3_A3_XPLAINED
00123   #include "uc3_a3_xplained/uc3_a3_xplained.h"
00124 #elif BOARD == UC3_C2_XPLAINED
00125   #include "uc3_c2_xplained/uc3_c2_xplained.h"
00126 #elif BOARD == UC3_L0_XPLAINED
00127   #include "uc3_l0_xplained/uc3_l0_xplained.h"
00128 #elif BOARD == STK600_RCUC3D
00129   #include "stk600/rcuc3d/stk600_rcuc3d.h"
00130 #elif BOARD == STK600_RCUC3C0
00131   #include "stk600/rcuc3c0/stk600_rcuc3c0.h"
00132 #elif BOARD == USER_BOARD
00133   // User-reserved area: #include the header file of your board here (if any).
00134   #include "user_board.h"
00135 #elif BOARD == DUMMY_BOARD
00136   #include "dummy/dummy_board.h"
00137 #else
00138   #error No known AVR board defined
00139 #endif
00140 
00141 #if (defined EXT_BOARD)
00142   #if EXT_BOARD == MC300
00143     #include "mc300/mc300.h"
00144   #elif (EXT_BOARD == SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_1)  || \
00145         (EXT_BOARD == SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_2)  || \
00146         (EXT_BOARD == SENSORS_XPLAINED_INERTIAL_A1) || \
00147         (EXT_BOARD == SENSORS_XPLAINED_PRESSURE_1)  || \
00148         (EXT_BOARD == SENSORS_XPLAINED_LIGHT_1)
00149     #include "sensors_xplained/sensors_xplained.h"
00150   #elif EXT_BOARD == USER_EXT_BOARD
00151     // User-reserved area: #include the header file of your extension board here
00152     // (if any).
00153   #endif
00154 #endif
